job_title: Clinical Laboratory Scientist in Reno, NV
pros: The people I work with are wonderful and work hard. Lab director and lab manager are both amazingly wonderful people.
cons: Prime Healthcare that owns Saint Mary’s is awful. You definitely know that Prime doesn’t care anything about you, especially if you work in the lab. It takes years, literally, for new equipment to be approved. Health insurance is horrible, it’s hard to find doctors offices that will take the insurance because they don’t want to work with Keenan insurance. Pay, pay, and pay. We are the lowest paid CLS in the city.
